alert.note: Alert for McHenry; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 2:50PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN WARD AND NORTHWESTERN MCHENRY COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM CDT... At 250 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Deering, or 20 miles northeast of Minot, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Ward and northwestern McHenry Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central North Dakota.
